title: IIT-M professor appointed to UN's Independent International Scientific Panel on AI
description: Professor B Ravindran of the IIT, Madras here has been appointed to the United Nations Independent International Scientific Panel on Artificial Intelligence, the city-based premier research institution said on Tuesday.

title: Chinese AI companies 'distilled' Claude to improve own models, Anthropic says
description: Three Chinese artificial intelligence companies used Claude to improperly obtain capabilities to improve their own models, the chatbot’s creator Anthropic said in a blog post Monday while also making a case for export controls on chips
content:
Three Chinese artificial intelligence companies used Claude to improperly obtain capabilities to improve their own models, the chatbot’s creator Anthropic said in a blog post Monday while also making a case for export controls on chips.

title: Forcing firms to report online threats may not be simple
description: A cybersecurity law expert says Canada could introduce laws requiring artificial intelligence companies to notify police of online threats, but the process would not be a simple one, since reporting every suspicion is “just not workable.”
content:
A cybersecurity law expert says Canada could introduce laws requiring artificial intelligence companies to notify police of online threats, but the process would not be a simple one, since reporting every suspicion is “just not workable.”

title: Top Gainers & Losers on Feb 24: Infosys, TCS, Coforge, Eternal, Cyient, Tata Elxsi, Welspun Living among top losers
description: The Indian stock market faced a significant sell-off due to concerns over artificial intelligence and geopolitical tensions. The Nifty 50 and Sensex fell over 1%, with technology stocks hit hardest, marking a steep decline in the Nifty IT index for February.
content: The Indian stock market witnessed a sharp sell-off in Tuesday’s session, as renewed fears surrounding artificial intelligence triggered another wave of heavy selling, with technology stocks bearing the brunt. The broad-based weakness dragged the key ... [4275 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - GLOBAL MARKETS-Stocks dip, investors twitchy about AI disruption
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Nearly 5.5 cr smart electricity metres installed across country under RDSS: Shripad Yesso Naik
description: With millions of smart meters generating granular consumption data, Artificial Intelligence can now be leveraged for accurate short-term and long-term demand forecasting feeder-level and transformer-level load prediction real-time demand response management dynamic load balancing and predictive maintenance and outage prevention, he said.

title: Hedge funds creep back into tech stocks after weeks of selling
description: Hedge funds last week bought the biggest tech stocks as well as those considered vulnerable to advances in artificial intelligence, said a note to clients from JPMorgan seen by Reuters on Tuesday.
content:
The world's most valuable technology stocks have suffered sharp declines this year after years of outsized gains, as investors question whether heavy on AI will generate sufficient returns to justify the lofty valuations.
